resources.string: Nike officially announced its much-anticipated Nike No Air; on October 4. We attended Nikeâ€™s London UK event, mirroring the main one taking place in San Francisco, US, where nike give respect to george floyd.

The heel offered excellent lockdown as did the midfoot. With more time spent on-court you will start to notice the fit loosening up due to the moisture and heat buildup so with that I did have to readjust the lacing after every game or so.
